name: Forbes (Fresh)
description: I had to go onto Forbes today and was surprised at the state of it. This fixes the ads, the unnecessary bar at the top and the blocky and bolded text on the headings. It also removes the collapsible bar at the bottom, the superfluous share bars and buttons. In the articles, it centers the article, makes the text more legible and a few other small changes.
additional_info:
Version 1.0 

/*****************************
Feedback is very much welcomed

A note to whomever decided it was a good idea to add share buttons all over the place:

When I'm reading an article I don't want to decide whether or not to share at the beginning 
of the article, during the article but the proper place and only logical place seems
to be after the article.
*****************************/
